scripts.build: yarn workspace medivialyzer-frontend build && yarn workspace medivialyzer-electron build && yarn workspace medivialyzer-electron builder
scripts.build:ci: yarn workspace medivialyzer-frontend build && yarn workspace medivialyzer-electron build && yarn workspace medivialyzer-electron builder:ci
scripts.serve: yarn workspace medivialyzer-frontend serve & yarn workspace medivialyzer-electron serve
